topic.title: Desktop experience
topic.shortdesc: Because Windows Server 2019 is a Long-Term Servicing Channel LTSC release, it includes the Desktop Experience. Semi-Annual Channel \SAC\ releases don't include the Desktop Experience by design; they are strictly Server Core and Nano Server container image releases. As with Windows Server 2016, during setup of the operating system you can choose between Server Core installations or Server with Desktop Experience installations.
